data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 6372, Version Hash: 7c5da37cdd5f3d46b2f9b244ba6856e08585f4da
data.actual_result: Close window icon stays red until cursor is back on discord window
data.expected_result: Close window reverts back to original color
data.short_description: The Close window icon appears red when cursor passes discord window
data.steps_to_repro: - Have discord in windowed mode - have open space for right side of screen - move mouse on top of close window icon - move mouse horizontally right of the discord window then move it freely along the open space
